name: Bull
description:
WASD and Mouse to look and move.
[Space Bar] Is used to charge and ram.

Hint: Some items can only be destroyed by ramming them.

You are a bull that has just escaped captivity. Animal control is hot on your tail. One of them takes aim and shoots a tranquillizer dart and hits you. Now your angry.  You have a little bit of time before you fall asleep. Break as much as you can before that happens.

Level 1: China Shop
Level 2: Pawn Shop
